body: You can use downtime to help others rest and recover using the Heal skill. For long-term care, treating wounds, and treating disease, you can spend Labor to modify your check result. Each 1 point of Labor spent adds 2 to your check.
name: Heal Others

sections.body: Spending a day of downtime on long-term care allows you to care for up to six patients that day.
sections.name: Long-Term Care

sections.body: Spending a day of downtime allows you to treat up to 50 patients of this type. You may combine this option with the treat disease option, caring for up to 50 total patients per day.

sections.body: Spending a day of downtime allows you to treat up to 8 patients of this type.

sections.body: Spending a day of downtime allows you to treat up to 50 patients of this type. You may combine this option with the treat wounds from caltrops, caring for up to 50 patients total per day.
